pages.title: Jardini Arowana
pages.text: It has numerous other common names, including northern saratoga, toga and barramundi ($(o)not to be confused with the barramundi perch, Lates calcarifer).$(br2)It is a member of the subfamily Osteoglossinae, a ($(o)basal$()) teleost group.$(br2)Its scientific name is sometimes spelled S. jardini.
